buildCommand: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');const del=p=>{try{fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true})}catch{}};del('src/app/labs/expertfolio');const rmStories=d=>{for(const e of fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true})){const p=path.join(d,e.name);if(e.isDirectory()) rmStories(p); else if(/\.stories\.[jt]sx?$/.test(e.name)) try{fs.rmSync(p,{force:true})}catch{}}};rmStories('src');" && next build
